articles.title: Meet Cillian Murphy, star of 'Oppenheimer' who's been in 6 Nolan films - USA TODAY
articles.description: Irish actor Cillian Murphy has been hiding in plain sight, having done around 50 movies and a dozen TV shows including Netflix's "Peaky Blinders."
articles.content:
